title: AI Face Age Estimation
subtitle: AI will guess your age based on your facial features
initialDesc: AI is analyzing your facial features…
group10.desc:
Wait, are you a kid? 👶
Fresh and lively! Still smells like school lunch.
group20.desc:
Feels like a college student 🎓
The popular one in class.
group30.desc:
Mature and balanced 🧑‍💼
This is your visual prime!
group40.desc:
Charisma with dignity 💼
Captivates with sophisticated charm.
group50.desc:
Class is eternal 🧐
Your words inspire trust.
group60.desc:
Giving off legendary vibes 🎩
You’ve reached the peak of grace and composure.
